title: Weekly Progress Meeting - Electrical Work
message: Review of cable installation progress and coordination with main contractor on road surface completion.

title: Light Fixture Delivery Update
message: LED fixtures delayed by supplier. New delivery date confirmed for January 8, 2025.

title: Pressure Test Results
message: Section A pressure testing completed successfully. All connections holding at required PSI.

title: Material Quality Verification
message: PVC pipes samples tested and approved. Certificate of compliance attached.

title: Project Completion Notice
message: All market stalls completed and inspected. Final handover scheduled for September 28, 2024.

title: Safety Inspection Scheduled
message: Electrical safety inspection for installed cable sections scheduled for December 20, 2024.
